summary: Implemented a new Trip History panel and added a Trip History entry to the mobile sidebar menu. Updated Auto Toll logic in CarExpensesPanel to auto-add a single Toll expense for the current weekday only and avoid duplicates. However, the diff evidence is truncated, so some required navigation/UI elements (desktop/in-app menu placement and Total trips display) cannot be fully verified. Additionally, there are signs of unrelated changes (e.g., default date range and weekend-counting logic) not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: A new Trip History entry is available in the ledger menu/navigation (including the mobile sidebar menu).
missing_requirements.reason: Mobile sidebar menu clearly includes Trip History, but the diff for the main (non-mobile) in-app navigation/tabs is truncated, so it’s not verifiable that Trip History is accessible from the primary ledger menu/navigation on desktop.

missing_requirements.requirement: A “Total trips” value is displayed at the bottom of Trip History and equals the sum of all trip counts shown for the selected date range (including the co-traveller income rows counted as 1 each).
missing_requirements.reason: TripHistoryPanel computes totalTrips, but the file content is truncated before showing the footer/total display; cannot confirm it is rendered at the bottom and matches the required presentation.

missing_requirements.requirement: With Auto Toll Add enabled, switching the ledger date range no longer bulk-creates Toll expenses for every weekday in the range.
missing_requirements.reason: CarExpensesPanel now includes logic to auto-add only for today, but the diff is truncated and does not show removal/absence of any previous bulk-add behavior tied to dateRange changes; cannot confirm switching date range no longer bulk-creates entries.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed ledger default date range behavior to current week Monday–Friday instead of current month (or prior behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 or REQ-2; BuildRequest explicitly focuses on Auto Toll daily-only behavior and adding Trip History without altering other ledger calculations/behaviors unless necessary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated weekend inclusion / weekend counting logic in Daily grid, Summary, and export to count saved weekend trips even when weekend checkboxes are unchecked.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals state not to change how Summary/Export/History dialogs calculate money amounts unless required for Trip History, and this appears unrelated to Trip History display requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme palette changes (warm neutral/amber palette) and Tailwind config adjustments.
